# Do not edit this file (including comments) unless absolutely necessary.
# Editing this file will invalidate the Docker build cache for all build layers.
# Do not add MKL or any packages related to Intel(R) to this file.
# Different PyTorch versions require different libraries and versions to compile.
# The dependencies below are for PyTorch 2.x. Do not use this file for PyTorch 1.x compilation.
# Specify package versions as necessary for the build.
astunparse
ccache
cmake
expecttest
filelock
fsspec
git  # Needed to get the `git` commit hash, etc.
hypothesis
jemalloc
jinja2
libjpeg-turbo
libpng
lld
networkx
ninja
numpy
psutil
pyyaml
requests
setuptools
sympy
types-dataclasses
typing-extensions
